Pittsburgh.WBZZ:
WBZZ (100.7 FM, "100.7 Star") is a Top-40 Leaning Adult Top 40 radio station licensed to New Kensington, Pennsylvania, broadcasting Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania, and owned by Entercom. Its transmitter is located in Pittsburgh's Spring Hill district and its studios are located west of downtown.


== History ==


=== Beginnings as WYDD ===
100.7 originally signed on the air in 1963 as WYDD with a power of 10,000 watts in New Kensington, operating as the FM sister station of WKPA, also licensed to New Kensington.
